mapper.select: SELECT a.tditSeq ,a.tditTitle ,a.tditSubTitle ,a.tditPublisherCd ,a.tditPublishingDate ,a.tditPrice ,a.tditDiscountCd ,a.tditStateCd ,a.tditItemCate ,a.tditIsbn ,a.tditPage ,a.tditSize ,a.tditWeight ,a.tditBookDesc ,a.tditBookDesc2 ,a.tditTableOfContents ,a.tditDelNy FROM tradItem a WHERE 1=1

SELECT a.tditSeq ,a.tditTitle ,a.tditSubTitle ,a.tditPublisherCd ,a.tditPublishingDate ,a.tditPrice ,a.tditDiscountCd ,a.tditStateCd ,a.tditItemCate ,a.tditIsbn ,a.tditPage ,a.tditSize ,a.tditWeight ,a.tditBookDesc ,a.tditBookDesc2 ,a.tditTableOfContents ,a.tditDelNy FROM tradItem a WHERE 1=1 AND a.tditSeq = #{tditSeq}
